sanitized-ref.title: Sanitized reference file
sanitized-ref.description: Some programs used by the workflow don't like special characters (like colons) in the sequence IDs in the reference FASTA file. The reference is thus "sanitized" by replacing these characters with underscores. This file is only generated when the workflow is run in variant calling mode.

sanitized-ref-index.title: Sanitized reference index file
sanitized-ref-index.description: FAI index for the sanitised reference FASTA file.

alignments.title: Alignments BAM file
alignments.description: BAM file with alignments of input reads against the references (in variant calling mode) or the created consensus (in de-novo consensus mode).

consensus-fastq.title: De-novo consensus FASTQ file
consensus-fastq.description: Consensus sequence file generated by de-novo consensus pipeline.

consensus-fasta.title: Consensus FASTA file
consensus-fasta.description: Consensus sequence file generated by variant calling pipeline.

variants.title: Variants VCF file
variants.description: VCF file of variants detected against the provided reference.

all-de-novo-consensus-seqs.title: Combined de-novo consensus sequences
all-de-novo-consensus-seqs.description: FASTA file containing all de-novo consensus sequences.

all-de-novo-consensus-seqs-index.title: Combined de-novo consensus sequences index
all-de-novo-consensus-seqs-index.description: FAI index for the FASTA file with the combined de-novo consensus sequences.

igv-config.title: IGV config JSON file
igv-config.description: JSON file with IGV config options to be used by the EPI2ME Desktop Application.
